website_summaries.verdict: This cream goes on thick and then blends into the skin for a big moisture boost.
pros: Covers up imperfections while giving skin a light glow without being shiny
Bonus: You only need to use a small amount of product
cons: It can be difficult to work into the skin

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but you must work it in.
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to get used to the application. I found this terrible the first two times I tried it, it did not break down with a gentle pat around my under eyes as most products. However, I decided to try to work with it and so the third day I blended it with my fingertip until it melted in, with some gentle pressure, and it did just that, melted in and smoothed over my problem area. So, if you think it is old or bad, give it another try. I think the product just needs more smoothing in that I was accustomed to.
customer_reviews.author: steelbird

customer_reviews.title: Truly Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this product! I've tried a million primers and this is as advertised - MAGIC. It's a knockoff of the tarte Timeless Smoothing Primer, which goes for $39 at Sephora. You won't regret this purchase! Some other reviews have mentioned it flaking, I haven't had that issue at all - perhaps they put on too much. A little goes a long way! My makeup glides on and stays all day - I've never, ever had that experience before - usually by afternoon I look like I never put on foundation that day. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: stlgal13

customer_reviews.title: Soft, dry and keeps face fresh, not oily
customer_reviews.text: Great primer, soft and dry, half the pea size covers entire face; keeps foundation and powder for a longer period. Goes very smoothly on the face and works very well over sunscreen and acts a protective layer by avoiding greasy feeling. I use over the sunscreen and go for workout, do not apply any foundation or powder. Gives matte finish even without foundation and further makeup. Other times I use foundation and makeup after this primer. Can be used just with moisturizer, moisturizer and sunscreen, or with all the steps of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jahara and Karim

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but weather ruined it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great makeup base, even for dry skin. I felt it made my makeup stay on longer and it made my face so smooth for makeup application. The only issue I had was with shipping. This product got really weird because it sat in a cold truck all day and then sat outside my house in the cold. I couldn't try it out until the next day because the cold affected the texture and consistency of it so much. If you can find this in a store then buy it there in cold months so this doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a week ago thinking that, like most product's it would probably not live up to what the advertisement says. I'm 53, and I have some fine lines on on my eyelids, crows feet and fine lines beneath my eyes. I read some of the reviews when I purchased this primer and I knew what to expect with it being thinker but melts and smooths out with the warmth of your skin, so I had not problems at all applying it I definitely see a major difference on how my eyes look even after a full day of work. This stuff holds up. I will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Frein/Betty Frein

customer_reviews.title: Small but not much needed!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today and so far I am liking it. Like many said it is small, but it sure doesn't take much. I would say it feels like a whipped butter and easy to spread. Goes on pink but is clear when you spread it. My foundation went on very nice. I use Believe which is only $5 and it looks like high cost foundation with this primer. Hid my large pores but not my dark spots. I will try spot priming tomorrow with a little extra. If for any reason I don't continue to like this I will update my review, but for now I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: The more I use it, the more I like it
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up my jar, i was hesitant to even try it. I've been wearing silicone based primers for so long and this base looks or feels nothing like what I'm used to. The texture is light and whipped and blends quite quickly and smoothly into my skin. I'm more impressed each time I use it. I even have worn it without foundation and concealer, just a little finishing powder for a clean, natural, fresh result. And that makes me happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanahan13

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer but am not thrilled with it. It does work well as a base for applying your makeup and I have found that it lasts most of the day before my makeup starts looking like it's fading. However, I don't like the fact that it is very thick and therefore makes my face feel like it's caked with makeup. Due to this heaviness, it also makes me worried about clogged pores and potential break-outs. Additionally, it is a very small jar so it doesn't last very long. I personally will be going back to e.l.f's hydrating face primer which I feel goes on lighter and smoother while still providing a good base to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Took away my shine!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something that works under my liquid foundation that eliminates my shininess. Usually halfway through my work day I would have to use my powder foundation for my shiny nose, chin & forehead. Now I don't have to! I actually forgot to apply this one day this week and remembered when I looked in my mirror at work. Wow was I shiny! I immediately knew I forgot to put this miracle base on. Also, there is very little smell to it. I'm a picky person when something is too overpowering in the smelliness department, especially on my face right where my nose is. I recommend and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trina F.

customer_reviews.title: But This Now!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best primer for your money, by far! I now buy & use this EVERY SINGLE TIME, and I’ve tried every primer from the most expensive and so on. Leaves skin feeling and looking flawless for a smooth surface for whatever you’re applying over it, and it also diminishes pores so well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Box the product came in seemed to already have been opened and looked a little beat up I only pulled the product out. Box looked like the picture when it came out of the shipping package. & for it to be in a glass jar, there was zero protection in shipping method. It came in an envelope that was crinkled everywhere. Actual product inside of the jar seemed to have been melted and hardened in a weird way even considering the colder weather. Won't be returning it since the product itself seems alright to use but won't be purchasing another one either.
customer_reviews.author: KLayfield

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is the first primer I have tried where I can instantly see a difference in the appearance of my skin. My skin appears smoother and my nose pores seem to disappear. I've also noticed that by the end of the day my face still looks great, not greasy or shiny. Its a thicker and creamy consistency that is a bit harder to spread than others I have used so I use small amounts and focus on one area at a time so it goes on evenly. I definitely plan to continue purchasing this primer! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It does not hide the pores.
customer_reviews.text: I will say that this is just a regular primer , no additional stuff to it. I actually bought it because they said it covers pores , NOPE !! This is not true. I’ve used it at least 3 times since I purchased it, the pores are still there. I will say it rather gives your face that silky feel to touch, which is what I noticed . Then it can make your face ashy or white which my other primer doesn’t do to me. Otherwise, it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Nwa 👸🏻

customer_reviews.title: THE Best Primer
customer_reviews.text: I have a draw full of what must be just about every brand primer made, but none have the same look, feel and wear as this L'Oreal face primer. Love, love this primer for a few years now, way before primers even became a big item. It's soft, it's silky, it's smooth and transparent, and does not make me break-out or cause an allergic reaction on my super sensitive/allergy-ridden skin. A little goes a long way, so even if the bottle looks small, it lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect primer for diminishing pores and controlling oil
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many primers looking for one that I liked as much as the old Garnier blur cream that was discontinued, and this is my favorite so far. It does a great job of both diminishing the look of pores and keeping your skin shine-free. I’m not crazy about it being in a little jar instead of a squeezable tube, because it can be hard to get out sometimes, but I like the product itself very much.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this because of the great reviews. I also love most of L'Oreal products. But this was very disappointing; it made my face look very artificial and almost bloated. I realized that some of the photos have the same look I didn't like on my face. I guess if you want to look like a model or a mannequin, it's good, but I wanted a more natural, dewy, youthful look. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: whitequeen

customer_reviews.title: dry and dull  skin
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product and saw some of the reviews I don't know if they are real or not but this one for sure is ... it really those nothing to the face only that in my experience it made it look very dry and dull I had to spray my face with rose water and other stuff to make my face glow terrible primer in my opinion it just leaves a film like effect on the skin but those not really penetrates
customer_reviews.author: Midnightwitch

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews before I purchased. Some said it was hard to spread onto the face, but I did not find this to be true. It is easy to spread and makes your skin feel so smooth and soft. I didn't find that it filled in the fine lines as though I hoped it would, but I have to say it did help with the application of the makeup going on. I will definitely purchase this product again. I loved how soft it made my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Okay. Little Goes a Long Way. Only Use SMALL Amount in Specific Areas
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. I had heard it was amazing which is why I purchased it. It’s thick. A little will go a long way. But it’s hard to spread, and sometimes it seems to make makeup cake in the area you apply it. So if you use it, be careful to only use the smallest amount possible. I do NOT recommend it for your whole face. Just small areas you want to blur. It works well for that if you only use a SMALL amount. It doesn’t have a scent which I love!
customer_reviews.author: OneWhisper

customer_reviews.title: Must make adjustments to the primer.
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest and give this product three stars. The product itself is very drying and is not comparable with many foundations, causing other make up products to get patchy upon application. If the primer is mixed with lotion prior to application then it is workable. The reason I give it 3 stars is because I don’t necessarily want to deal with mixing the primer to work. The primer does give a very smooth look. It fills all pores and evens out the skin’s texture. I love that the primer comes in a heavy glass container.
customer_reviews.author: Khandice

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found in this price range
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic - apply it to one half of your face, wait two minutes and compare the difference and you'll see what I mean. I have previously used NYX and Maybelline primers, and they don't come anywhere close. This stuff visibly shrinks pores and will disappear fine lines. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the $40+ shine free stuf!
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY oily skin, so I have to apply this more than once per day, but when I do, it works like a charm. I out it on my face after I wash it in the morning, and if I wear makeup that day, I wait about 5 minutes to be sure it is in place and dry before I apply the makeup. It lasts about 4-5 hours for me, so I have one in my purse to reapply later, but as I said, my skin is VERY oily, so it might not need to be reapplied for most people.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Good primer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good primer for the price. I have dry skin and was concerned that it will mattify and dry out my skin before application of foundation. I was surprised that it settled nicely and provided a nice base for foundation. As for its claims that it hides pores and smoothes lines, I did not have that experience. If you're looking for a decent primer without spending a fortune, this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: lacali

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: I was using and E.L.F. primer and liked it but I find this gives me more of a blur effect and doesn't seem as greasy. Really helps to disguise pores. *UPDATE* If you find the primer isn't going on as well as it used to or your makeup looks dry, try using a facial scrub to exfoliate your skin. My skin changes with the seasons and can get really dry. I find if I don't exfoliate, my makeup will not go on well no matter what primer I use. It really does help and makes the primer be able to do what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Elkhunters

customer_reviews.title: great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I wear this under my tinted, mineral sunscreen and then put my foundation on top of that and this stuff works for well over 8 hours to control my oily skin and large pore size. I'm so glad I found it. I was using the hourglass mineral primer which I also like but it was costing me over $50!
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smoothing primer
customer_reviews.text: I think this does a great job of setting down a good primer for makeup. It goes on sheer and doesn't leave any type of residue that affects my makeup. I can definitely tell a difference when I forget to use it and then go to apply makeup. It allows everything to go on more easily. Been using it for years and I don't see myself stopping anytime soon. I don't think it really does anything to moisturize my skin, but that is not really why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works really well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few years now. It’s fantastic. Keeps my makeup in place all day even in the summer heat. I actually like to use it even when I’m not wearing makeup over it because it gives my skin a slightly more matte finish. I have an oily T-zone and dry cheeks, but this is perfect for all over. It moisturizes without feeling oily. A little also goes a LONG way. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gina - Mom On The Mother Road

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Definitely softens and smooths the skin. It does fill in/soften the wrinkles. It also creates a nice base for applying make up. I know some people say it gets flaky like. I too have noticed that, however, I am forever using different moisturizers prior to applying this product. There are only one or two moisturizers that I use that cause this to happen. So if you find this happening, I would suggest trying with a different moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: First impression: Did I get a sample size? I honestly thought it was bigger, so when I opened the package, I was a little disappointed. I bought this in hopes it would be a dupe for my Juno moonshine primer. Unfortunately it is not. Although I have to admit, even though the consistency is thick (which I don’t mind) it does melt into the skin for a silky finish. I just hate that the bottle was tiny. I guess I will use it as an eyeshadow primer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as described. It has the consistency of paste not a spreadable cream that can be spread easily. As far as minimizing pore size that did not happen. I tried to put make up On top and it gave a caked-look appearance. The product with the makeup was hard to remove
customer_reviews.author: joy g helms

customer_reviews.title: Helps fill in enlarged pores.  Useful to reapply during the day to those noticeable areas.
customer_reviews.text: This is helping me with enlarged pores. I use it to help smooth out those spots before I apply foundation. Need to recheck and reapply after putting on foundation and sometimes during the day. Need a TINY bit to do the job.I do not use it all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyfide

customer_reviews.title: Feels like silk on your face
customer_reviews.text: BEST EVER PRODUCT I don't know what this stuff is made of but it is wonderful. I was just reading around about skin care products and came across this product. I have ordered 3 and wish it was a bigger container. It takes only a small amount and makes your skin feel like silk. I have never seen or had anything like it. Even my husband uses it at night just because it makes his skin feel so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foundation won’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Update: I found this does work when I use L’Oreal foundation. It feels great going on, and makes pores look much better. However, once I applied foundation, it makes the foundation just wipe right off as I apply. Tried 2 different foundations and a cc cream. None worked with this primer. Tried using more and less of the primer, nothing helped. Basically foundation repellant. Good product if you don’t use foundation though.
customer_reviews.author: 3DogNight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuff, but not a lot for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars in the only thing that stopped me was the size of the jar! It is very very tiny and I've used it for 2 days and have only about three-quarters of a jar left. As far as the way it works, it really is awesome stuff. My face never look smoother when I put on Foundation. Every one of my foundations makes my makeup look cakey, but I use a little bit of moisturizer and then put this on top of the moisturizer about 10 minutes after.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent base
customer_reviews.text: Excellent makeup base, if I want my makeup to stay matte all day this is my go-to, especially for my complexion which doesn’t usually keep makeup matte. I tend to use it only for special occasions where I wear makeup but I would except with daily use it could last a month or so, easy to apply, liked it so much I bought it for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Abby J

customer_reviews.title: BAD FORMULA
customer_reviews.text: I disliked how the face primer did not go on smoothly on my face. I've used this for years but this formula has seemed to change for the worse. My face became very dry and I developed a rash. My foundation just sat on my face and seem to magnify the large pores on my face which I do not like. Bring back the original formula.
customer_reviews.author: T boyee

customer_reviews.title: i love to use this as a base before applying foundation
customer_reviews.text: i love to use this as a base before applying foundation. It smoothes the skin by filling in fine lines or pores. It's also great if you get greasy eyelids as the day goes on...keeps your eyeshadow in place. using this, you also end up needing to use less foundation. i started using it a couple years ago and it remains part of regime when i do my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: ksc30

customer_reviews.title: great for acne scars
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how long I lived without this stuff. It's amazing for covering up shallow pitted acne scars. I often use just this with a little concealer as my daily makeup routine. Totally "spackles" the skin and evens out the complexion.
customer_reviews.author: MKT23

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe!
customer_reviews.text: I am a lover of Benefit Pore no More primer and Smashbox and this primer is doing a good job for a much more reasonable cost! It is not as buttery smooth as the ones i've used but it does a good job. You just need to make sure you rub it into your face and let it sit for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not have high hopes for this product....boy was I wrong. It is an excellent primer. It is easy to apply, spreads over the face instantly and leaves the skin velvety smooth and primed. Better than all the products I have tried over the years costing much much more.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly happy with this product. The product feels heavy when spreading it and I have an oily T-Zone and it doesn't seem to really help set my makeup. Also, was really disappointed with how small the jar is and how much it takes to cover your face. Might work well for people with dryer skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: I had to change out my face products due to eczema. I ordered this because of the cost. Much to my surprise, it works and feels great. I will be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Primer
customer_reviews.text: This is great for larger pores and brightening your skin a bit, with or without foundation. It evens out skin tone and makes your skin feel smooth. It doesn't work great on super dry areas though, or areas that are heavily moisturized with oil-based moisturizers. Works best over non-oily moisturizer or bare skin. Not good for under eyes. The skin is a bit too delicate. Best just to use a concealer. Recommended, however.
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: Heavy texture
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a primer to use under makeup base. I had received a sample of one that was light and easy to spread underneath my makeup, allowing a lighter look. This L’Oréal product is heavy, not light at all. I asked to return the product, Amazon didn’t even want it back. Very unsatisfactory texture.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: This primer works miracles if you have big pores. I first tried Clinique Pore Minimizer, and it did not work for me, AND, it made my face itch. L'Oreal Paris Magic Perfecting Base Face Primer not only minimizes pores, but helps foundation go on flawlessly. Very little product is required to achieve a dramatic result. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora  Noir

customer_reviews.title: It filles the gaps if used properly
customer_reviews.text: I read through all the reviews and learned that if it was spread properly and thoroughly it works really well. I definitely found that to be true. I still used another moisturizer underneath and let it dry fully. Then used this as primer and spread it to fill in my little lines until it was perfectly smooth. Then I let this dry before applying a cream foundation. It made my skin stay really smooth and not look dry, and helped my make-up last through a bit of sweating even. I am in love with it and will use it under my make-up now always.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Snow

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin super soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I put it to the test as soon as I received it in the mail, it's so good! Made my foundation and cream contour apply even more smoothly than before. Usually the type of contour cream that I use dries fast but this product helped it to stay moist making it everything easier to blend. Its very small though and I wish they had bigger sizes
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: cheap tiny pink cute dont get fooled
customer_reviews.text: this product was not what I expected, I tried it four times thinking maybe I put way too much since i read the reviews, and nope the fourth time i just dipped my finger in and put my makeup on after and within an hour my face started feeling very bumpy like i had sand or dirt. sadly the primer does not work, it feels good and smells good but it's not meant to be for a primer
customer_reviews.author: david cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Worst primer ever. In their defense I usually spend $40 on my primer (Younique and/or MAC), but was broke so I bought this instead. You get what you pay for. Hard to spread, left weird powdery lines, and all in all I'd rather toss this $10 than continue to use it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer
customer_reviews.text: I always used a more liquid type primer and then I saw a review on this product, so I tried it. It is a thick type product but it spreads well and is long lasting. It helps to keep my make up on longer than the others more expensive products I've used. It may take time to get used to at first but give it a few days , you'll really like it!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: I feel like my foundation doesn't stay on well on my cheeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every morning for a few weeks as part of my beauty routine. It definitely helps your foundation go on smoother and leaves your skin feeling silky to the touch. I feel like my foundation doesn't stay on well on my cheeks but that is the case for me for most primers because they are naturally very red. I'm not really a fan of the pot that it comes in though and would rather it be a tube for cleanliness purposes. It is hard to scoop it out when you have long nails too.
customer_reviews.author: SoleilTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Want to rate this more than five stars! Love!
customer_reviews.text: This went on smoothly, moisturized every little crease/patch of dry skin, and provided a super even base for my foundation. I was able to use about half of the amount of foundation I usually use. This product literally took five years off my face. Never putting foundation on without it again. I'm 48, caucasian, with mild aging for my age but it's starting to "show".
customer_reviews.author: K. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great under my make up. I am 49 and this helps keep everything in place. Goes on smooth and a little goes a long way. Price is great! If I have to say anything negative it would be that I wish it was in a tube. I am not a fan of dipping my finger in the jar, I would prefer to squeeze out the product, it seems cleaner that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for darker African American skin tones
customer_reviews.text: Wow....I don't normally write reviews. However, this primer is worthy. I am a middle aged african American woman with deep caramel skin tone. It has been difficult to find a primer for oily skin that does not make my skin look ashy or blue hued. This primer goes on like silk. It lasts all day. It can be worn alone or under makeup. I have tried many high dollar brand primers that can't touch this one. Also...a little bit goes a looooong way. Please try this. You wont be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Not good on forehead lines
customer_reviews.text: This base has a “fluffy” consistency and goes on smoothly. If you have fine lines, it works well under eyes but not on the forehead. Even the lightest layer can make forehead makeup look smudgy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my 70s and have tried lots of things to hide or erase some of my wrinkles. I’ve been very impressed with this product! It’s at the top of my list of things I’ve used and I will definitely stick with it. It does hide the wrinkles and evens out discolorations in skin tone, too. I don’t use any foundation makeup. I just use this. Wish it came in a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The jar is very tiny, but if you use a good makeup brush, it takes very little. If you use a good brush, you will hardly use any foundation at all with this, and everything looks better as well. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Although I am very pleased with L'Oreal cosmetics in general, I found this foundation base OK but not spectacular as others have. It is not as moist as said. I prefer to use Cerave facial moisturizer. Besides, the amount in the jar is so little it doesn't pay to spend $10 for such a small amount. That is the last time I buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Altieri

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy Primer
customer_reviews.text: Neutral sort of color that seems to work on under eye circles and any redness, blurs pores and fine wrinkles. I put it next to my moisturizer and use it right after so it spreads nicely and even if I don't apply base, it gives my skin a nice matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: A little sticky but so smooth
customer_reviews.text: This products texture reminds me of the Benefit Porefessional. This one seems a bit thicker & stickier, but definitely smooths out the face just as much. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Lovely on 50+ skin.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other reviews for the heads up on being such a tiny jar. With that being said it only takes a tiny amount of product to get lovely, smooth, gliding coverage. I use 5-6 miniscule dots on forehead, nose, chin, and checks, then quickly and easily blend. The reviews not satisfied with this product may have used TOO much product that it couldn't blend in.
customer_reviews.author: Snowflakes

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't buy drugstore brands of makeup, but I decided to try this and compare it to the Clarins primer I have. Pro tip: Save yourself a lot of money and get this instead of the Clarins. It works just as well for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Grzeskowiak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hiding pores
customer_reviews.text: This is thick and smooth, filling in pores and making my skin softer before applying make up. This is the only product I have tried (and there have been many) that truly does a good job at minimizing the appearance of my large pores. My only complaint is that it can leave a small area of white residue that I need to rub off before applying makeup. I dab it on the large pores on my nose, rub it in and then apply it to the rest of my face with a lighter application. After putting on Bare Minerals, my face looks flawless!
customer_reviews.author: cjs view

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like the results around my eyes and lips. Just make sure you give your other facial products you apply before the primer time to absorb before applying the primer. Then give the primer time to absorb. I'll definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lea

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No sent, works great at hiding pores and imperfections. One of the best primer, especially for older skin, in my opinion, and I've tried many.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Tarte brand primer.
customer_reviews.text: I previously used the Tarte primer at Sephora. It’s a similar consistency to this L’Oreal product at 1/2 the price!!! My face didn’t break out and I got practically identical results. If you are looking for ways to save money on beauty products and still have the quality of over the counter, this one actually fits The bill. I’ve purchased it twice now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the hype. Definitely could’ve saved my coins. I mean it blurs out my pores but it’s the film layer I don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this product for years.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. It goes on very sheer and creates a matte finish which fills in all the pores. It also learns a slight tint which although doesn’t have any color seems to be a little bit brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different products and spent so much money trying to find a product that would minimize my "50 year old skin" and this product really works! It feels silky and is not greasy, oily, etc... I am so impressed and the price is RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B Catanzariti

customer_reviews.title: Enlarges Imperfections
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product because it had good reviews. However, I didn’t see much of a difference in my skin or makeup. The only thing it does is clog my pores and makes my skin look matte. I do have relatively large pores and acne, this just seemed to make my imperfections stand out more.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Really great base primer
customer_reviews.text: I started using base when I received a sample. L’Oreal base is really great. It’s easy to apply, dries quickly and creates a great foundation for my foundation makeup. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mónica

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite primer! Typically buy from drug stores but after this purchase maybe I’ll keep buying from amazon. It’s thick enough to blur deep pores and works great with any makeup I’ve used. More importantly, there’s no weird clumping after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Thicker primer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good thick primer. I like to use this by my nose(larger pores) and then use use a thinner(cheaper) one for the rest of my face since this primer is on the smaller side. I have noticed if I touch my face it doesn’t hold my makeup well, but if I don’t touch my face then I am okay.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It can survive working a double
customer_reviews.text: I have very very oily skin and this is now my go to primer before foundation. I work long shifts, sometimes doubles. Every time I look at my makeup while wearing this primer through out the shift it looks like I just did it. The only tiny issue I have is if I get it too close to underneath my eyes it causes little dry patches with my concealer over it. I try to just stay in my t-zone to avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Storch

customer_reviews.title: BEST MAKE UP CEATION EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: LOREAL PERFECTING BASE MAKES MY MAKE UP GLIDE ON SMOOLY AND FLAWLESSLY. IT ALSO MAKES MY POORES DISAPEAR AND ADDS AN EXTRA LAYER OF LOCKED IN MOISTURE THAT KEEPS MY FACE LOOKING DEWEY ALL DAY AND NIGHT.I ALSO HAVE TO USE LESS FOUNDATION WHEN I USE IT BECAUSE IT IS SO HYDRARING WITH OUT BEING GREESY. IT MAKES MY SKIN LOOK LIKE I HAVE NO MAKE UP ON- IT SOME HOW DIFUSES FOUDATION BETTER, AND YOU ONLY USE A TINY, TINY BIT TO COVER YOUR ENTIRE FACE. I LOVE IT !!! CORDIALLY, MARIA
customer_reviews.author: MARIA ERNST

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing primer. Best I have ever used. My foundation goes in smoother, looks flawless and lasts a lot longer than it did before. I see my pores disappear and look flat and transparent. Definitely my new permanent primer.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kitty Bang Bang

customer_reviews.title: outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This really smoothes out and covers up lines and pores especially those on your upper lip and any larger pores on nose. I will never be without this product - cant always find in a drugstore but thankful that Amazon had it.
customer_reviews.author: Faz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer. It makes my skin soft and smooth and it makes my blush and concealer stay in place no matter how many times I touch my face. I have ordered it twice and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L. Yakelis

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Was caught off guard. I never used a primer before. This is great stuff. Fills in all the fine lines and sets a smooth finish to apply make up to. This will be something I will want to use daily!
customer_reviews.author: J. B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick and clumpy, I dislike everything about the texture and ended up washing it off after I put on my foundation be aus3 it seemed blotchy. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: K. Amble

customer_reviews.title: creates smooth base for makeup
customer_reviews.text: i use before putting on makeup and it creates a "no pore" look. this is a very tiny jar, and you only use a very small amount, i put a small amount on the tip of my finger and dot it around and then i rub it in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Apple

customer_reviews.title: Wow fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This base is so fabulous and spreads easily I just dotted it around my face then blend it makes my face look flawless at 53
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: L’Oreal Paris review
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised.. Makes makeup smooth and very good moisturizer.. Container is as small as it looks.. I didn’t feel as if it last a extra long time but it last longer than most.. Thahk You for prompted delivery..
customer_reviews.author: Gail I Miller

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & Silky. Makeup stays fresh all day.
customer_reviews.text: Texture is a bit waxy going on. But after applying, skin feels very smooth and silky. I use it under makeup (mineral powder). Makeup stays on all day and looks fresh. Will buy again. I like the jar. No waste as in other containers! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shops

customer_reviews.title: With oliy skin, I have found that this product ...
customer_reviews.text: With oliy skin, I have found that this product curbs oily breakthroughs for the majority of the day. Provides a matte finish under foundation or makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki A. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best base product for the price. There is a marked difference in my middle-aged skin when I use it over my moisturizer. I can truthfully say this is one product I wouldn't trade in for anything. (Nobody paid me in goods to say this. Honest.)
customer_reviews.author: noneayo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Please try!
customer_reviews.text: Im in LOVE! Im so glad I took the chance and tried this product out. Goes on smooth, feels moisturizing! Makes my makeup look amazing and not cakey at all. I cant live without this now!
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used smash box products and I recently found this Loreal magic perfecting base n I love this product. It goes on smooth and stays on for hrs under my powder foundation. It’s a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Smooths skin
customer_reviews.text: I like how the product goes on to smooth large pores and even some lines. Why I did not give it a five was because it was hard to get it out of the little jar. A tube would work much better in my opinion. But it is a nice product and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C F.

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you’ll see the difference.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend using this base cream. As an older woman I didn’t realize how much this product softened and filled lines so the foundation went on more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Conway

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5 stars for me!
customer_reviews.text: I like my primer to be in a squeeze bottle or dropper. The small container makes it a little messy to get the primer out and then it get under my fingernails. The primer itself works well. It goes on a little dry but did help make my makeup stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F.

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure it’s fake L’Oréal product
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this -2 I would. I’ve purchased this product in store, and I absolutely loved it! So I’m not sure if this is the fact that it was delivered and different temperatures within route, or the fact that it’s just a bad batch. It’s not easy to spread, it makes my face look like it’s peeling under my foundation. Next time I’ll just be buying in store.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Super great product to make pores disappear!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for years! I won’t use any others than this brand of pore primer. I put it on after face lotion and a pruning spray. I barely use any every day and it covers all my deep pores. For me, it lasts for months and never dries up or becomes sticky. Also, no matter what make-up I use, everything sets on top of the primer super smoothly and lasts all day. No more visible pores in my pictures and less work to cover flaws!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hayton

customer_reviews.title: First time user and loved it
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the folks who wrote reviews that encouraged me to give this product a try. It did exactly what it said it would. A little goes a long way. Great size for travel if you have to get all your toiletries in a quart size bag.
customer_reviews.author: snwrites

customer_reviews.title: Best Base!
customer_reviews.text: This is a thick base--which is was I expect. Goes on nicely, but it not like a lotion that just disappears into the skin. It fills like it is supposed to. Best I have tried and I've tried many.
customer_reviews.author: N.S. Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: It is very tiny
customer_reviews.text: It is very tiny i did not open it because I want it to return it the next day but come to find out that the item is not returnable which is very strange but okay now I have to keep it and try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Timea Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering if I got a bad bottle of this product, because there is nothing at all "rich and creamy" about the bottle I received. It is, in fact, dry and almost crumbly, and is very hard to really smooth into my face. Has anyone else had this problem? I suppose I could send it back to Amazon, but it's a lot of trouble, especially if that's the way it's supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's ok, but not magic and not worth the price for such a tiny amount
customer_reviews.text: It goes on fine, smells good and does the job. However there are many other primers for less that do a better job. I don't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Olexia S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: First time really using primer and seen some good reviews of this and it was cheap enough I wouldn't be upset if it didnt work. It worked well though my makeup seemed to not settle into my creases so quick and lasted throughout christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla j.

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money. Learn to work with your regular foundation and your skin.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Described as difficult to spread. Thought it was easy to spread but filled pores with white paste. Just pay for a peel and get it over with. I could do just as well with regular foundation working up and down on pores to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Magic Perfecting Base Face Primer, 0.5 FL (oz)
product_meta.description: Size:1 CountDiscover the secret to perfect skin texture. Magic Perfecting Base Primer instantly smoothes skin for a lasting look. The silky, lightweight formula glides onto skin and minimizes the look of pores and fine lines. The result—a unified matte finish that's flawless. Can be worn alone or under foundation to create an even canvas. Suitable for all skin types. Dermatologist tested. Non-comedogenic. Hides pores and smoothes lines Velvety-smooth texture A lasting matte finish Application: Using a gentle circular motion, blend in over the whole face or targeted areas. Wear alone or apply under makeup to create a smooth canvas. For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.
feature_bullets: PORE MINIMIZING MAKEUP PRIMER: The silky, lightweight formula glides onto skin and minimizes the look of pores and fine lines. Skin feels smooth to the touch. The result a unified matte finish that’s flawless

MAKEUP PRIMER FOR FACE AND UNDEREYE: Apply on bare skin or after moisturizer has absorbed completely. Blend into under eye to smooth over fine lines, nose and cheeks to minimize appearance of pores and blemishes, t zone for a matte result

THE FOUNDATION OF YOUR LOOK: From BB creams to blush, L'Oréal face makeup has everything you need for a smooth, even finish. Highlight to illuminate your look, use concealer to hide imperfections or apply contouring makeup for enhanced, defined features

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oreal Paris Cosmetics helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, eyeshadow pallettes, lipsticks and much more

PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: Infallible Pro Spray and Set Makeup Extender Setting Spray. With primer as your base, lock your makeup in place for hours with this setting spray. The perfect combination to keep your makeup looking just applied all day

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
